text: I have Vida V1 pro. Almost completed 7000km, lots of problems l faced within six months. Company service is not good. After two service the issues have not resolved. Handlebar & ignition switch quality is very poor. Software have so many issues. Many times the vehicle go on ' LIMP HOME' during ride. It's is very risky while highway ride. I think petrol vehicle is better choice than huge money invested in ev.

Build quality: Average (90‚ÑÖ fiber, hard plastic)

Scooter tech: Good 
Ride feel: Awesome
After sale service: ok
So worth buying: Yes.... üòä

text: I bought it. There are lots of small issues in this scooter. Switches are not working properly. Rain water easily enter in the boot. Removable batteries are not getting 100% charged at home.
